name: Cars crusher
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 50.

Theme: Delay the inevitable

Survive as long as possible, destroy your enemies and upgrade your weapons.

Avoid the enemies and let your weapons do the work!

Link : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/cars-crusher
